decision_conditions: The amendment to the approved application listed below is considered to be of a minor nature and acceptable in their own right and will not require resubmission of a fresh planning application.

The following amendments are deemed to be accepted: amendments to the approved light stock brick band (replaced by a light coloured stone band) and the approved light stock brick lintels (replaced by a light coloured stone lintel).
The permission hereby granted does not supercede the previously imposed conditions.
description: Application for non-material amendment to planning permission Ref: P1374.24 dated 13/12/2024 to allow for amendments to the approved light stock brick band (replaced by a light coloured stone band) and the approved light stock brick lintels (replaced by a light coloured stone lintel)
